website_summaries.verdict: The iPad mini lets you run the best library of apps in the biz on a tablet you'll actually want to carry, but it's not the best small-screen tablet you can buy.

customer_reviews.title: For those looking for help choosing between the two I would probably be happier with the mini as I haven't found the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the new iPad air as I thought the mini would be too small and heaven. How wrong was I! I bought the mini por my husband as his laptop broke and I have to say, I use his more then the air which is heaveyer and less practical in my eyes. For those looking for help choosing between the two I would probably be happier with the mini as I haven't found the screen size too small nor noticed anything different so, for the difference in money, I don't think it's worth stretching yourself. For those on the go then the mini is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie L chinn

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Speedy arrival and no problems at all with the product. I wasn't going to be in when they delivered the parcel which I was concerned about, however the courier emailed me giving me lots of options as to what I want doing with them item when it arrived. I requested that they leave the item in a safe place which I stated, and there it was when I came home. They even posted a note through the letter box telling me where they had put it. Such a relief to have trusty couriers as I have had problems with these in the past! As for the iPad itself, wonderful. I use it everyday and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Friend

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed with this iPad mini it's lightweight, sleek, so thin and looks totally fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this iPad mini it's lightweight, sleek, so thin and looks totally fabulous! The screen is really bright and clear and great for taking photos! It connects quickly to WiFi and mobile networks and downloads quickly too. Great for surfing the web, checking email, editing movies and photos, writing reports and reading books and great for listening to music. We take it everywhere when travelling and wouldn't be without it for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: MuiMui22

customer_reviews.title: an easy life
customer_reviews.text: With no smartphone and an old version mac book it was time to get myself up to date with apps and tablets. I'm an apple girl so the iPad was an obvious choice. I preferred the size of the mini and got the 32GB memory rather than the 16GB one, as I felt the extra money was worth the additional capacity. After a few months of using it I don't know how I managed without one. I love it. Very pleased with my choice. My tip would be to think about what you want to use it for and then get the iPad with size/memory that best suits your needs. Then you too will be app happy...
customer_reviews.author: GAdams

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and in superb condition. However as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in superb condition.However as I write it is on it's way back to Amazon for a refund. The ipad constantly opened and closed apps on its own, the screen zoomed in and out without warning and generally acted as if it was possessed! A pity that it wasn't checked over properly before being offered for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Alfiesmum

customer_reviews.title: Better Than the Large iPad
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed on receiving this was how comfortable it feels in the hand. Working in the industry, I've had lots of experience with every flavour of iPad from the first to the Air, and I ordered this in the hope that it would offer the same functionality of the larger device but just be more convenient to carry around. There's no discernible difference between the mini and it's big brother in everyday use, it's just lighter and easier to hold in one hand. For me, this is the one I pick up most often which probably says more than all the technical comparisons you're likely to read.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Becoming more disappointed by the day
customer_reviews.text: I got this in July and it has slowly been winding me up with its lack of responsiveness. Sometimes just can't get onto to the internet even when right next to the working hub and the desk top is having no problems. Some things just wont open at all no matter how many times I tap them. On Facebook it never registers that I have read a posting, I have to go onto the desktop to mark them as seen. Becoming more disappointed by the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lj Hall

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very prompt delivery. I was hesitant buying go iPad mini after having a full size iPad. I brought this as I have problems holding things and needed something lighter. I was worried about the size of the screen and text etc, but there was no need. The iPad mini 2 is light, the screen is fine, the apps still very easy to use. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ternaya

customer_reviews.title: iLove my iPad.....
customer_reviews.text: I love my iPad and since it arrived I have hardly put it down. My laptop was getting old and slow and it has been such a relief to be able to hop on the Internet in seconds and do a quick email check. I have whatever app that takes my fancy and it's great for downloading from iTunes. All very convenient. I love listening to music on the go and that is the only slight downside - carrying it around. My phone is android so my music isn't on all my devices. Despite that I would certainly recommend iPad mini, it has so much going for it.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet in its class I have used.
customer_reviews.text: The ipad Mini is the best 7 inch tablet I have used. The screen quality is excellent and its very light. This versions is quite reasonably priced for an Apple iPad and anyone poendring about whether to purchase a Google Nexus or this device I would choose the iPad. The iPad mini camera is not quite as good as the iPhone4 but its not bad and I find it useful. The iPad Mini has been powerful enough to run every APP from the Apple Store. Skype works well on it. BBC iplayer and similar TV apps run fine on it with great playback.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Both sons have the mini iPad, in hindsight I probably would have bought the mini if I'd had the chance to try one! One of my sons is autistic ... he uses his iPad so easily and didn't need much help from the off. We walked down a line of tablets and let him play with all of them and he chose a mini iPad over all the others he tried. They do take some beating ... everything seems to make sense and all our devices share music, apps etc. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lamyman

customer_reviews.title: excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: simple and effective, great for just casual use. Best part of this product in my opinion is its battery life. I know it will fade overtime but I've had mine for about 5 months now and two weeks ago i accidentally left it on sleep with about 8 percent battery over the weekend. Turned it on on monday night, nearly 3 days later and it was 7%. (just thought that was interesting..) And yes, when you actually use it the battery life is great too. Overall very very happy, its such an impressive device.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought it was difficult to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was difficult to get the hang of it ,however a friend set it up for me@for a couple of weeks was ok.Then it stopped working completly and after a long session with help line the conclusion was I needed to go to an apple store(nearest was 38miles away) wherby after another long wait&consultation the ipad needed replacing!! a result finally but it has knocked my confidence in the product and hope I can continue with no more faults
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: A fabulous buy.
customer_reviews.text: A fabulous item, We bought this for our dad as I already have one and think it is great. My dad had been using another tablet but thought this was very slow, he was very impressed with the general speed of the i-Pad and being able to use SkyGo outside / in establishments in Wifi areas (no, or far less bufferring now). Dad is very happy with this and has been able to learn what he needs quite quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. E. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad Mini
customer_reviews.text: After a bad start necessitating reset I am now on the road to becoming adept. Can't blame the iPad but I am a new user and trying to cope with technology new to me! As I live in Spain most emails came in Spanish and muchas paginas, so wished I had the choice to get these in English. Finding a lot of help on You Tube when facing difficulty. I now love it and getting a little obsessed with it. Fascinated with being able to ask questions to the search engine, using voice, and getting responses -magic!
customer_reviews.author: Eleni

customer_reviews.title: The WiFi has never worked
customer_reviews.text: The WiFi connection on this device has never worked despite my WiFi connection being fine. Everything else works but without WiFi it's quite useless
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet! We have three in the family now and have never encountered a problem that can't be sorted easily. We also have several Android tablets, which are useful, but it is the iPads that get all the use. Don't buy cheep, it isn't worth it. Pay that little extra and get the satisfaction of knowing you won't get all the problems that other OS suffer. Delivery was very quick, price was great, what more could you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Pleased Customer
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good device. I love playing a game on it, the game is called hearthstone. The game is high quality. The iPad is also good for general mobility. I use it at my girlfriends house, the WiFi connection is good. I have no complaints about the product on a quick review. If you are thinking about buying this for the same things I did; Laying in bed on YouTube, Gaming and relaxing. This will not, well should not disappoint you.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: GO FOR IT.....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well wrapped and quickly. If just an iPad Mini 1 (a little bit old, but still WAY ahead of others) is all you need, then this is ideal. And the price here is fantastic. I love it. Thoroughly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark, Guildford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case from exceptional retailer.
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the one I bought for my iPad Air several months ago, which remains as good as new, even after heavy use. I thought I had a problem with it but it turned out to be a faulty new iPad!!! The case was perfect. However, I received superb service from the vendor who went out of their way to try and resolve what was thought to be a faulty product. Despite being more expensive than my original purchase it remains exceptional value compared with the official case. It fits perfectly, protects well, is very slim and, If it lasts as well as my previous one, will be a bargain purchase from an exceptional retailer.

customer_reviews.title: First bite of the Apple & I like it

Now living in my van where it was needed & doing the tasks it was bought for. Happy days indeed.

customer_reviews.title: iPad Mini

If you require a medium-sized touch-screen computer then this is for you. I would not be without my own and that is why, when we came up with the idea for a gift for him, it was a no-brainer.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and amazing!

I had a few problems at the beginning because it didn't want to connect to our internet, but in the end it did, and once I had got the emails set up it was all systems go. Takes great photos too. A really useful thing to have, and you can do so much with it, I have only just started to learn. Would highly recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad mini - black (16gb, wifi)
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault the delivery or the product. However, must fault the description. As has been mentioned by others, the iPad was meant for another market other than the UK. Enclosed with iPad is a 3 pin adapter. The enclosed cable is a two pin. When setting up the iPad mini, the default language was Polish!! This didn't cause any problems, but you wonder if you're buying the genuine article. It would have been nice if the supplier had mentioned these points.

If this does not improve I will contact Apple.

customer_reviews.title: great tablet, very high quality, very quick and easy to setup.

I personally prefer the android OS, but still respect that the Apple products are very, very good.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for Radio podcasts

I love the RSS app which downloads all my favourite Radio 4 podcasts directly on to my ipad continually, so I always have an interesting radio programme to listen to. I love the Kindle app, and all my games, Scrabble, sudoko and solitaire. In fact, it is always entertaining and I can't keep away from it!

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant purchase

We are currently in Criatia and have found it so useful to keep in contact with friends and family. It is so much better and quicker than my iPhone. The screen is very clear and the camera takes great pictures without having to have much skill. Overall I am really pleased that I took the plunge.

customer_reviews.title: just as expected

Flash maybe replaced in the future so this might not always be a problem, apart from this it has been a great gift and the battery life is great.
